description: Provides the properties of the specified optimization job.

parameters.name: OptimizationJobName
parameters.description: The name that you assigned to the optimization job.

nested_items.name: OptimizationJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the optimization job.

nested_items.name: OptimizationJobStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the optimization job.

nested_items.name: OptimizationStartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the optimization job started.

nested_items.name: OptimizationEndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the optimization job finished processing.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when you created the optimization job.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the optimization job was last updated.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If the optimization job status is FAILED, the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: OptimizationJobName
nested_items.description: The name that you assigned to the optimization job.

nested_items.name: ModelSource
nested_items.description: The location of the source model to optimize with an optimization job.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 URI that locates a source model to optimize with an optimization job.

nested_items.name: ModelAccessConfig
nested_items.description: The access configuration settings for the source ML model for an optimization job, where you can accept the model end-user license agreement (EULA).

nested_items.name: AcceptEula
nested_items.description: Specifies agreement to the model end-user license agreement (EULA). The AcceptEula value must be explicitly defined as True in order to accept the EULA that this model requires. You are responsible for reviewing and complying with any applicable license terms and making sure they are acceptable for your use case before downloading or using a model.

nested_items.name: OptimizationEnvironment
nested_items.description: The environment variables to set in the model container.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DeploymentInstanceType
nested_items.description: The type of instance that hosts the optimized model that you create with the optimization job.

nested_items.name: OptimizationConfigs
nested_items.description: Settings for each of the optimization techniques that the job applies.

nested_items.name: ModelQuantizationConfig
nested_items.description: Settings for the model quantization technique that's applied by a model optimization job.

nested_items.name: Image
nested_items.description: The URI of an LMI DLC in Amazon ECR. SageMaker uses this image to run the optimization.

nested_items.name: OverrideEnvironment
nested_items.description: Environment variables that override the default ones in the model container.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ModelCompilationConfig
nested_items.description: Settings for the model compilation technique that's applied by a model optimization job.

nested_items.name: Image
nested_items.description: The URI of an LMI DLC in Amazon ECR. SageMaker uses this image to run the optimization.

nested_items.name: OverrideEnvironment
nested_items.description: Environment variables that override the default ones in the model container.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ModelShardingConfig
nested_items.description: Settings for the model sharding technique that's applied by a model optimization job.

nested_items.name: Image
nested_items.description: The URI of an LMI DLC in Amazon ECR. SageMaker uses this image to run the optimization.

nested_items.name: OverrideEnvironment
nested_items.description: Environment variables that override the default ones in the model container.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OutputConfig
nested_items.description: Details for where to store the optimized model that you create with the optimization job.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a key in Amazon Web Services KMS. SageMaker uses they key to encrypt the artifacts of the optimized model when SageMaker uploads the model to Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: S3OutputLocation
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 URI for where to store the optimized model that you create with an optimization job.

nested_items.name: OptimizationOutput
nested_items.description: Output values produced by an optimization job.

nested_items.name: RecommendedInferenceImage
nested_items.description: The image that SageMaker recommends that you use to host the optimized model that you created with an optimization job.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that you assigned to the optimization job.

nested_items.name: StoppingCondition
nested_items.description: Specifies a limit to how long a job can run. When the job reaches the time limit, SageMaker ends the job. Use this API to cap costs.

nested_items.name: MaxRuntimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum length of time, in seconds, that a training or compilation job can run before it is stopped.

nested_items.name: MaxWaitTimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum length of time, in seconds, that a managed Spot training job has to complete. It is the amount of time spent waiting for Spot capacity plus the amount of time the job can run. It must be equal to or greater than MaxRuntimeInSeconds. If the job does not complete during this time, SageMaker ends the job.

nested_items.name: MaxPendingTimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum length of time, in seconds, that a training or compilation job can be pending before it is stopped.

nested_items.name: VpcConfig
nested_items.description: A VPC in Amazon VPC that your optimized model has access to.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs, in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. Specify the security groups for the VPC that is specified in the Subnets field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC to which you want to connect your optimized model.
(string) ---
